chart.description: Awareness, interest, and satisfaction ratio rankings.
Overview of opinions on the technologies surveyed. Darker segments represent positive opinions, while lighter segments correspond to negative sentiment.

For each technology, how usage is spread among respondents who picked different experience ranges. Note that the experience in question here is general JavaScript experience, not experience with a specific technology.

react.description: A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

preact.description: Fast 3kB React alternative with the same modern API. Components & Virtual DOM.

js.description: A progressive, incrementally-adoptable framework for building UI on the web

ember.description: Ember.js - A JavaScript framework for creating ambitious web applications

legends.would_use: I've USED it before, and would use it again
legends.would_not_use: I've USED it before, and would use it again
legends.interested: I've HEARD of it, and WOULD like to learn it
legends.not_interested: I've HEARD of it, and am NOT interested
